name: zhaojun
summary:
Data analyst with 8+ years of experience specializing in data engineering and financial analytics. Skilled in designing scalable
ETL/ELT pipelines, building integrated data layers, and developing dashboards that enable data-driven decision-making across
Finance, FP&A, and Accounting teams. Proven track record of delivering $2M+ in annual cost savings through curated data
products and resolving an $80M financial discrepancy to ensure SOX and regulatory compliance. Proficient in SQL, Python, and
Spark, with expertise in data visualization and pipeline monitoring. Adept at transforming complex, large-scale datasets into
actionable insights, bridging business requirements with technical solutions through cross-functional collaboration.
skills:
• Programming Skills: Python, SQL, Spark/Hive, Java, Tableau, Microstrategy, Sensor, Tellius, Excel
• Technologies: Linux, Docker, Hadoop, TensorFlow, Sklearn, Pandas, Langchain, Streamlit, FastApi
• Certifications And Awards: Chinese Private Equity Fund Practitioner Certification (2018), Google Analytics Certificate, Coursera
ETL, Finance & Accounting Certificate
• Languages: Fluent in English, Mandarin
